item.title: Vaibhavi Mehta's Professional Portfolio
item.description: Visualization 1 Box-plot showing the range of Final Exam scores of Statistics students statscores = c(57, 66, 69, 71, 72, 73, 74, 77, 78, 78, 79, 79, 81, 81, 82, 83, 83, 88, 89, 94) m = median(statscores) boxplot(statscores, xlab = "Final Exam Scores", main = "Final Exam Scores of Statistics Students", horizontal = TRUE, col = "greenyellow") abline(v=m, col="blue") Visualization 2 par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Linkedin', 'Instagram', 'Reddit'), col = c('#0352D9', '#FF69B4', '#FF0021'), init.
